alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 20 at 2:30AM PDT until March 22 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TUESDAY TO 5 PM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Locally up to 16 inches highest peaks. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Esmeralda and Central Nye County. * WHEN...From 5 AM Tuesday to 5 PM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
